name: Advanced "NBA Live 2005" Trivia Online Trivia  | 10 Questions

questions.text: How much is Antoine Walker's Defensive Rebound?
questions.explanation:
79.

	Antoine Walker is the Power Forward on the Atlanta Hawks. He has an overall rating of 80, and a defensive rebound of 79.

questions.text: How much is Peja Stojakovic's 3-Point shot?
questions.explanation:
92.

	Peja Stojakovic is the second best 3-Point shooter in the "NBA Live 2005" after Larry Bird, who has a 3-Point of 95. He has an overall rating of 81, making him one of the best Small Forwards.

questions.text: How much is Ben Wallace's Defensive Awareness?
questions.explanation:
99.

	Ben Wallace is the best defensive player in the "NBA Live 2005". He has an overall rating of 77.

questions.text: Julius Erving, Lenny Wilkens, and Jason Richardson are the only players in the "NBA Live 2005", with a dunk rating of 99.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Julius Erving, Jason Richardson, and DOMINIQUE Wilkens are the three best dunkers in the NBA. They all have a dunk rating of 99. Lenny Wilkens is the Point-Guard of the 60's All-Star Team.

questions.text: How much is Chucky Atkins' 3-Point Shot?
questions.explanation:
76.

	Chucky Atkins is one of the shortest players. This Los Angeles Lakers' Point Guard has an overall rating of 55.

questions.text: Which of these players has a 3-Point Shot of more than 80?
questions.explanation:
Tracy McGrady.

	Tracy McGrady shoots at 82. Kobe Bryant and Voshon Lenard shoot at 75 and 78 respectively. However, Shaquille O'Neal is as bad as you can go, with 0.

questions.text: What is Steve Nash's dunk rating?
questions.explanation:
0.

	Steve Nash is among the few in the "NBA Live 2005", who are not able to dunk the ball at all. Others include Earl Boykins, the shortest player in the game.

questions.text: Carmelo Anthony is the best sophomore in the "NBA Live 2005".
questions.explanation:
False.

	LeBron James is the best sophomore, with an overall rating of 84. Carmelo Anthony comes second, with an overall rating of 80.

questions.text: Reggie Miller and Ray Allen both have the same 3-Point Shot.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ray Allen has a 3-Point Shot of 85, and an overall rating of 85. Reggie Miller, who is on the 90's All-Stars, has a 3-Point Shot of 86, and an overall rating of 64.

questions.text: Steve Francis is the best Field-Goaler.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Shaquille O'Neal is the best field-goaler, with a rating of 99. He also has a dunk of 99, a height of 7'2, and a value of more than $29 million. That is the most in the "NBA Live 2005"I hope that you enjoyed my quiz.
